preference.name: AWC_visProductViewOpenConfiguration
preference.preference_description: Defines the configuration setting used while loading product views (SnapshotViewDataset objects) in 3D mode. The valid values are: Static: The product structure is not reconfigured while loading the product view. Any modifications in the structure made after saving the product view are not visible. Dynamic: The product structure is reconfigured while loading the product view. The 3D viewer displays the current state of the product with this mode. This is default value.
